intro.title: ROS 2 Nervous System
intro.description: Welcome to the ROS 2 Nervous System! This comprehensive guide covers the fundamentals of ROS 2 for humanoid robot control, designed for robotics and AI students focusing on physical AI systems.

modules/digital-twin/intro.title: Digital Twin: Physics Simulation and Virtual Environments
modules/digital-twin/intro.description: Welcome to the Digital Twin module, where you'll explore the integration of Gazebo physics simulation, Unity environment design, and sensor simulation for humanoid robots. This module builds on the foundational ROS 2 concepts you learned in the previous module and focuses on creating realistic simulation environments for robotics applications.

modules/ros2-robotics/index.title: ROS 2 Robotics Education Module
modules/ros2-robotics/index.description: Welcome to the ROS 2 Robotics Education Module! This module is designed for robotics and AI students focusing on physical AI systems. You'll learn about middleware for humanoid robot control via ROS 2.
